main event: A UFO was sighted near Camden, New Jersey on May 17, 18, 19, and 21, 1964, characterized by a bright red egg-shaped object that changed to yellow and green with a rapid fluttering motion.
interesting points: The sighting lasted 10 to 20 minutes, The object hovered before moving quickly towards Philadelphia, The witnesses reported a high pitch whine during the sighting, Multiple sightings were reported by civilians including a commercial photographer, There was clear weather with visibility up to 10 miles at the time of observation.
sighted object: one egg-shaped bright object changing colors
witness description: Mr. Avenues from Burlington, NJ and Mr. Street from Delanco, NJ
